item.title: MCON: The Switchblade of Mobile Controllers | By Ohsnap
item.description: With console-level precision and effortless portability, the MCON transforms your smartphone into a gaming powerhouse. Play Now. Hey, we’re Ohsnap! We’re a North Carolina-based mobile accessory brand driven to find better ways to use your phone. We’re known for creating ultra-functional, ultra-thin phone grips with a focus on premium materials and usability. We already have 6 previous successful crowdfunding campaigns (3 on Kickstarter, 3 on Indiegogo), each of which has been fulfilled on schedule.
